entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please consider adopting global usings in the codebase #60678

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/required-members #60674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Pass options to FixAllAsync, simplify CodeAction registration #60665
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delay starting the work to scan for todo-items #60654
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #60677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60673
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers
  • Trim unnessasary leading lines when removing usings #60672
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Use same naming style for modules as classes #47242
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community
